title: LOFI HIP HOP - Lofi Beats Music Pack
description: Lofi Hip Hop - 12 Songs / 128 Audio files
longDescription:
Create the perfect relaxing atmosphere for your project with this high-quality music pack. It includes 12 Lofi Hip Hop songs ready to add to your video, live, game or any media. 


A preview containing a sample of each track is available here: [DEMO] and [DEMO]


Each track includes alternative length edits and seamless loop versions to adapt to your project requirements. This bundle contains a total of 128 audio files encoded in 3 different formats. Each song includes alternative versions, short edits and seamless looping tracks.


All the songs are composed, produced and arranged by Joel Loopez




FEATURES:


  • Tracks: 12 Original songs with a different mood and intensity 
  • Audio files: 128 Individual audio files
  • Seamless loop: Each track includes at least 2 seamless loops
  • Short edits: 60, 30 and 15 seconds version of each track
  • Audio files format: WAV, MP3 and OGG for each audio file
  • Uncompressed size: 1,75 GB
  • Resolution: 44.1 khz / 16-bit / Stereo files


LICENSING:

  • The resources can be used in free and commercial games, videos, and other forms of media.
  • You may freely edit the resources for your own purposes, including using modified versions in games, videos, etc.
  • Credit is optional but appreciated and recommended.
  • You may NOT redistribute the resources themselves, or derivatives thereof - neither for free, paid or otherwise.
  • You may NOT transfer this license, or issue sub-licenses for the usage of the resources (or derivatives thereof) by third parties.
  • I am not responsible for damage caused by using the resources. The resource pack has no warranty, including the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. Use at your own risk.
technicalDetails:
• - Tracks: 12 Original songs
  • - Audio files: 128 different audio files
  • - Seamless Loop: Each track includes at least 2 seamless loops
  • - Short edits: 60, 30 and 15 seconds version of each track
  • - Audio files format: WAV, MP3 and OGG for each audio file
  • - Uncompressed size: 2 GB
  • - Resolution: 44.1 khz / 16-bit / Stereo files
